Package Managers

Class MovieManager

Object
MovieManager
public class MovieManager extends Object
Manager class to manage movie related actions, such as creation, deletion editing and searching of movies.

    • instance

      public static MovieManager instance
      instance checks whether MovieManager has been instantiated before. Static variable is the same between objects of the same class.

    • FILE

      public static final String FILE
      The file name of the database file that this manager will access

  • Method Details

    • getInstance

      public static MovieManager getInstance()
      getInstance checks if MovieManager has been instantiated before. If no previous instance was created, it creates a new one, else it will use the original instance.

    • read

      public ArrayList<Movie> read()

    • createNewMovie

      public void createNewMovie(int id, String title, String movieType, String synopsis, String rating, String director, ArrayList<String> cast, double duration, LocalDate releaseDate, LocalDate endDate)
      Method to create a new movie from inputted values
      Parameters:
      id - ID of movie
      title - Title of movie
      movieType - Movie type (e.g. Horror, Comedy)
      synopsis - Synopsis of movie
      rating - Movie rating (e.g. PG13, NC16)
      director - Movie director
      cast - ArrayList of cast members
      duration - Movie duration
      releaseDate - Movie release date
      endDate - Movie end date New movie is directly written to the movie database

    • createNewMovie

      public void createNewMovie(Movie movie)
      Method to create a new movie directly from a movie object
      Parameters:
      movie - New movie is directly written to the movie database

    • searchById

      public Movie searchById(int id)
      Method reads movie database to search for movie by its ID
      Parameters:
      id -
      Returns:
      returns movie IF the ID exists else return null
